song_lyrics: Aum agnaye svāhā, Aum varuṇāya svāhā...
Ḍhol ḍhamake, zānza zamake, gīt madhurā...
Relāye relāye relāye, gīt madhurā relāye,
Ḍabhāṇmā Hari yagna kare chhe, mahāchorāshī thāye,
Vipra Vednā mantra bhaṇe chhe, hom ghṛutanā thāye,
Vasundharānā mahābhāgya chhe, dhūm gaganmā...
Felāye felāye felāye, dhūm gaganmā felāye... ḍhol...
Aḍhārso ne chhyāsaṭh samvat Poṣhī Pūnamno din chhe,
Santo bhakto ā utsavmā lākho re le līn chhe,
Poṣhī Pūnamno din āyo, Poṣhī Pūnamno din āyo,
Mūljī Sharmā dīkṣhā laīne Guṇātītānand thāy chhe,
Dīkṣhā daīne harakhe Hari Akṣhar mahimā gāy chhe,
Akṣhar mahimā gāya chhe... Akṣhar mahimā gāya chhe...
Shrī Hari bole rahasya khole... Shrī Hari bole rahasya khole...
Mūljī-Sharmaṇe dīkṣhām dadānasya prajāyate |
Bhūyānme'tra samānando yato dhāmākṣharam sa me ||
Guṇātītānand-rūpam vishvakhyātam bhaviṣhyati...
Shrīmukhe Shrī Hari vachano uchchāre,
Guṇātītānand dhām chhe māru akhanḍ rahyo chhu hu emā,
Muj upāsanā Akṣhar dvārā vistarashe avanimā,
Akṣharbrahma chhe guru anādi, mokṣhanu dvār e...
Kahevāye kahevāye kahevāye... mokṣhanu dvār e kahevāye...
Guṇātīt guru-paramparā ahī shāshvat dīse āj,
Bhagatajī ne Yagnapuruṣhjī, Yogījī Mahārāj,
Ā brahmānḍe upāsanāno dhvaj farakāvyo āj,
Anant jīvanī mukti kare chhe Pramukh Swāmī Mahārāj,
Guruhari Pramukh Swāmī Mahārāj... Guruhari Pramukh Swāmī Mahārāj.
Jay ho jay ho... jay ho jay ho...
Jay ho jay ho... jay ho jay ho...
He nav-khanḍ dharāmā gūnje, āj Swāminārāyaṇ nām re,
Pragaṭ Brahmane sange, sahu pāme Akṣhardhām re...
Jay ho jay ho... jay ho jay ho...
Jay ho jay ho... jay ho jay ho...
He āj chhāyo re chhāyo re chhāyo, ā brahmānḍmā ānand,
Tame pragaṭ bīrājo chho Akṣhar, Guṇātītānand...
Jay ho jay ho... jay ho jay ho...
Jay ho jay ho... jay ho jay ho...
title: Ḍhol ḍhamake zānza zamake gīt madhurā

metadata.kirtan_info:

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
